import React from "react" import TTMLogo from "../public/ttmvectorlogoblue.svg" import Paper from "@material-ui/core/Paper" import NavBar from "./NavBar" import "./WindowLayout.scss" const logoStyle = { background: `url(${TTMLogo})`, backgroundSize: "contain", backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", height: `${props.width ? `calc(${props.width}/6)` : "63px"}`, width: `${props.width || "380px"}` } const windowStyle = { margin: props.logo ? "0 auto auto auto" : "auto", height: `${props.height || ""}`, width: `${props.width || "380px"}` } export default props =>
{ !props.logo ? null :
} {props.children}
